title: Modern Talking - Discography
description:
The ultimate discography torrent of Modern Talking. If I&#039;m not wrong I have included all the music from their albums. Now, let&#039;s get to the details:

Everything is encoded as MP3, at 128 kbps. It sounds well enough, if you need more, go buy an audio CD as their audio is encoded lossless. Don&#039;t encode into Ogg Vorbis because you&#039;ll surely get worse sound as the formats are very different.

The MP3 tags are messed up and I&#039;m too lazy to edit them cause I don&#039;t use them ;)
Just edit them yourself, you can do this from Windows Explorer on XP and Vista, and on other operating systems there are many ways to do it.

The files have a number at the beginning of their name in order for players to list them in their order on the albums. You can get rid of it if you want.



That&#039;s all! After you get it, please seed! Thank you!
